headline: Why The Narrative Around Northrop Grumman Is Shifting After Analyst and Industry Developments
summary: Northrop Grumman shares have seen a modest lift in analyst sentiment, with the consensus price target rising slightly from $603.32 to $615.56. This boost reflects increased optimism, driven by expected acceleration in revenue growth and the company’s expanding international defense business. Stay tuned for insights on how to monitor ongoing changes in Northrop Grumman's narrative as market expectations continue to evolve.
